titles.title: Let Our Praise to You be as Incense

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Let our praise to you be as incense
let our praise to you be as pillers of your throne
let our praise to you be as incense
as we come before you and worship you alone

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
as we see you in your splendour
as we gaze upon your majesty
as we join the angels
and proclaim together your holiness

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Holy, holy, holy
Holy is the Lord
Holy, holy, holy
Holy is the Lord
